---
category: news
title: "AI Service Transformed Thousands Of Women’s Photos Into Fake Nudes Without Consent"
excerpt: "More than 680,000 women had no idea their photos were being uploaded to a bot on the messaging app Telegram to produce fake realistic nude images without their consent. About 104,852 images posted publicly."
